title: Run Module Specification
description: Common specification for stream-juggler modules that can be run

cardinality.description: The boundary of interval in that a number of inputs can change

types.description: The enumeration of types of inputs

name.description: The unique name for a module

license.description: The software license type for a module

inputs.description: The specification for the inputs of a module

outputs.description: The specification for the outputs of a module

engine-name.description: The name of the computing core of a module

engine-version.description: The version of the computing core of a module

options.description: The json-schema for some optional parameters

validator-class.description: The absolute path to class that is responsible for a validation of launch options

executor-class.description: The absolute path to class that is responsible for a running of module
